executiveSummary: 13-year-old entrepreneur Sophie Overton pitched her company, Wise Pocket Products, on Shark Tank seeking $30,000 for 15% equity. She impressed the sharks with her product innovation—socks and leggings with patent-pending pockets—and her negotiating skills, ultimately securing $35,000 for 25% equity from Lori and Damon.
keyDecisions: Sophie accepted an investment deal of $35,000 for 25% equity from Lori and Damon.

actionItems.task: Streamline production to increase output beyond 100 units per month
License Wise Pocket Products when production is scaled

nextSteps: Sophie will use the investment to scale production and explore licensing opportunities to expand the reach of Wise Pocket Products.
